stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Maybe shouldn\'t teach intro courses cause he tends to speed through material. Allows a note sheet for tests. No graded homework, just suggested problems, which you should do. Issue is there aren\'t always solutions to the problems so you don\'t know if you did them right, and the book is vague. Nice guy though, hoping to take later classes with him

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: An extremely frustrating professor who improvises every class and puts little thought into how to conduct class. Dryke is a bum in every sense of the word. Get used to rarely understanding whats going on in class because of his poorly planned uninformative "lectures". If you haven\'t taken this class yet, I hope you are good at teaching yourself.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I\'m felt like Dryke needed a positive rating. Honestly one of the best run labs, I\'ve been through and Dryke is actually a pretty good guy. I can\'t attest for his material science class but as far as Materials Lab he\'s a great professor.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Everyone hates on papa Dryke but honestly he\'s not too bad. Material Science is tough but he curves everything a ton. Lab with him should actually be a fairly easy A because there isn\'t much for material you need to study for the tests and the 2nd half of the class is just papers.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Very smart guy, but this can cause him to go off on tangents during lectures. The textbook is your best friend. Does not assign homework, but does give "suggested problems" that are not turned in for points. Only take him if you are interested in an in-depth understanding of Material Science, not for an easy A.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)

comments: If you take this professor you are most likely going to regret the day you did. Take it from a brother, DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED. Even if your graduation is going to be delayed a whole year. SKIP this class. It is literally hell, I pray that I die everyday before going to this class.

comments: His quizzes are ridiculous, he has a talent for taking a main topic and asking some off the wall question about some obscure off shoot of it. Very helpful and approachable, aside from the ridiculous quizzes and tests a good professor.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Good guy outside of class, but as a teacher he\'s horrible. He\'s gotten lazier as the semester goes on, canceling class half a dozen times. He reads off powerpoints he got from other teachers and goes ways too fast. He\'s hard to follow along with and speaks over your head. The best days in class are when we self-grade homework.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Stick to graduate work. Some folks should not be teaching, Dryke is one of them. He\'s a funny, easy going guy but really has a problem with teaching new material. He assumes students know way too much when teaching foreign material and goes way too fast. Like I said, good guy, but shouldn\'t be teaching.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: very friendly, always helpful if you need it. grades are generally low but he is not afraid to curve. upper level classes are better because he is more interested.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: tests are very difficult, to the point of un-doable. lectures are useless. He mindlessly reads a power point which is more or less pages and images copied out of the text. random quizes where the average is usually between 15 and 20%. Waste of time... read the book. You will still fail the tests even if you have know the material
